SELECT user.gid, username, realname, user.status, GROUP_CONCAT(role.gid) rids, GROUP_CONCAT(role.name) roles FROM fota_users user LEFT JOIN fota_users_role u_r ON user.gid = u_r.admin_id LEFT JOIN fota_role role ON u_r.role_id = role.gid GROUP BY user.gid;

SELECT m1.gid key1, m1.name title1, m2.gid key2, m2.name title2 FROM fota_permission m1, fota_permission m2 WHERE m1.gid = m2.p_id AND m1.type = m2.type AND m1.type = #{type} AND m1.status = m2.status AND m1.status = 1 ORDER BY m1.sort, m2.sort
